translations: （电力或其他服务的）停止供应期，设备停开期

phrs.translation: 断电；动力故障；功率输出

sentences.sentence: "This outage will be worse than one caused by Irene," said Peter Bloom, 70, of South Windsor, because he relies on electricity to heat his home.
sentences.translation: 南温莎70岁的彼得·布鲁姆说：“这次断电比飓风艾琳造成的停电更严重。”因为他要靠电来给家里供暖。

sentences.sentence: We had a major power outage, due to the frizzling up of the neutral connection.
sentences.translation: 由于中性连接的混乱，我们发生了严重的电力中断。
